::DrillBit::

DrillBit steped back, showing that he ment no harm.
"I'm sorry if I have said something to affend you. I asure you, I mean
no harm to you. The only thing I hurt are Maximals."
He reached his hand out slowly.
"Now come on. Let be show you around."
